::: speaker-bio
[Mitchell Oâ€™Hara-Wild](https://mitchelloharawild.com/) (he/him) is a PhD candidate at Monash University, creating new techniques and tools for forecasting large collections of time series with Rob Hyndman and George Athanasopoulos. He is the lead developer of the tidy time-series forecasting tools fable and feasts, and has co-developed the widely used forecast package since 2015. He is an award-winning educator, and has taught applied forecasting at Monash University and various forecasting workshops around the world.
